cause.description:
~you hear about it all the time, but does anyone really do anything about it? the discrimination must stop against gays, lesbians, bisexuals, and transgender/sexuals, because really there is nothing different about us, we are just as much human as heterosexuals are, and if loving people is wrong the world as 10x more fucked than i thought
1. Discrimination in schools
2. Discrimination in work
3. Discrimination in home life and the outer world
cause.name: GLBT
